base_description: Rectangular sliding window, gray frame, modern style.
part_description: Two large rectangular glass panes, set in a gray frame, with one pane positioned to slide horizontally over the other.
internal_interaction_description: The two glass panes are set within a single frame, allowing one pane to slide horizontally along a track over the other. This sliding mechanism is facilitated by the frame's integrated track system, enabling smooth movement and secure closure when aligned.
external_interaction_description: The window interacts with external elements by providing a barrier against weather while allowing light and air to pass through when open. It can be operated by a person sliding one pane to open or close the window, adjusting ventilation and visibility.
